actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care

official_title: A bill to permit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to proceed with a certain transfer of functions within the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration without regard to the congressional notice-and-wait requirements of section 210 of title 38, United States Code.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to undertake a reorganization within the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans Administration (VA) to transfer the functions of the Technology and Performance Evaluation Section and the Information and Education Service at the VA Prosthetics Center in New York to a new Prosthetics Assessment and Information Center in the Washington, D.C., area.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to proceed with a certain transfer of functions within the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration without regard to the congressional notice-and-wait requirements of section 210 of title 38, United States Code.
